name: Pudgy Penguins
description: PENGU is the official coin of Pudgy Penguins. Pudgy Penguins has become the face of crypto with one of the most influential communities in the industry. From large companies wearing the Penguin, to being featured in ETF commercials, to garnering millions of followers and over 50 billion views, the Pengu has become a cultural icon. PENGU allows for the ever-expanding Pudgy Penguin fanbase and the hundreds of millions of people outside of crypto that see and share the Pudgy Penguin everyday, to join The Huddle. PENGU is a symbol for community, memes, and good vibes. Believe in Pengu. Believe in the Prophecy.
